name: World Piece and Peace
storyline: World Piece and Peace is set in a world where witches and humans are at war with each other, and a very dramatic story unfolds throughout the game. In addition to the main "Progression Battle" as the story progresses, there is also a "Simulation Battle" in which you work together with your friends to destroy enemies, and an "Action Battle" in which you cut through dungeons with a sword in your hand.
summary: World Piece and Peace is a feature-length dark fantasy RPG. Each of the 3 battle systems require a different set of controls and tactics - it's up to you to grasp their characteristics and defeat the powerful enemies that stand in your way.
